title: Science Education Competency Enhancement Program Using Game-Based Learning (GBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Expertise in Science and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Focused on developing competencies in designing and operating GBL (Game-Based Learning) pedagogies using mobile apps and microlearning content in smartphone-based constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can define and explain the five core competencies of GBL (basic/advanced game literacy, GBL design, operational management, and evaluation).
Learners can design and prototype three or more GBL scenarios suitable for mobile environments in the science domain.
Learners can develop science education modules applying five game mechanics to enhance learner engagement through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
